S06sspp2_1u:14: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:15_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pṛthivīdhātvasattāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatāyāṃ pṛthivīdhātuviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:15_1: pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:15_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā pṛthivīdhātvasattānyā pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatānyā pṛthivīdhātuviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:15_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasattā yā ca pṛthivīdhātuśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:15_5: yā ca pṛthivīdhātuviviktatā yā ca pṛthivīdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:15_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:16: abdhātvasattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abdhātuśūnyatayā pūrvāntano bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:26: abdhātvasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:27_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābdhātvasattāyām abdhātuśūnyatāyām abdhātuviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:27_1: abdhātvasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:27_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cābdhātvasattā
S06sspp2_1u:27_4: yā cābdhātuśūnyatā yā cābdhātuviviktatā yā cābdhātvasvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:27_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:40_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tejodhātvasattāyāṃ tejodhātuśūnyatāyāṃ tejodhātuviviktatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:40_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:53_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:79_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānadhātvasattāyāṃ vijñānadhātuśūnyatāyāṃ vijñānadhātuviviktatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:92_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāvidyāsattāyām avidyāśūnyatāyām avidyāviviktatāyām avidyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:157_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sparśāsattāyāṃ ca sparśaśūnyatāyāṃ sparśaviviktatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:182: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:183_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tṛṣṇāsattāyāṃ ca tṛṣṇāśūnyatāyāṃ tṛṣṇāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:183_1: tṛṣṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:196_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputropādānāsattāyām upādānaśūnyatāyām upādānaviviktatāyām

S06sspp2_1u:209_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:221: jātyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:222_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra jātyasattāyāṃ ca jātiśūnyatāyāṃ jātiviviktatāyāṃ jātyasvabhāvatāyāṃ

S06sspp2_1u:222_5: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:247: dānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:248_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitāsattāyāṃ dānapāramitāśūnyatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_11]

S06sspp2_1u:501_2: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyānupalambhaśūnyatāsattānyānupalambhaśūnyatāśūnyatānyānupalambhaśūnyatāviviktatānyānupalambhaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:501_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:501_4: yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāsattā yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:501_5: yā cānupalambhaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:501_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:509: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvaśūnyatāsattayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:512: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:513_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ abhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:513_1: abhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:513_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:513_4: yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā cābhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:513_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:522: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:523_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra svabhāvaśūnyatāsattāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:523_1: svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:523_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyā svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:523_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:523_5: yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:523_6: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:534: abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:536_2: nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatānyābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:536_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:536_4: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsattā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśūnyatā yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāviviktatā
S06sspp2_1u:536_5: yā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:536_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad [ŚsP_II-1_25] advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:548: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:549_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāsattāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:549_1: smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:549_2: upalabhyate. na cānyā smṛtyupasthānāsattānyā smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatānyā smṛtyupasthānaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:549_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsattā yā ca smṛtyupasthānaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:549_5: yā ca smṛtyupasthānaviviktatā yā ca smṛtyupasthānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:549_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:561: samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:562_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samyakprahāṇāsattāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaśūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:562_2: na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā samyakprahāṇāsattānyā samyakprahāṇaśūnyatānyā samyakprahāṇaviviktatānyā
S06sspp2_1u:562_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samyakprahāṇāsattā yā ca samyakprahāṇaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:562_5: yā ca samyakprahāṇaviviktatā yā ca samyakprahāṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś
S06sspp2_1u:562_6: ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:569: ṛddhipādaviviktatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayāparāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:573: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:574_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrarddhipādāsattāyām ṛddhipādaśūnyatāyām ṛddhipādaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:574_1: ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:574_2: na cānyā ṛddhipādāsattānyā ṛddhipādaśūnyatānyā ṛddhipādaviviktatānyā ṛddhipādāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:574_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra

S06sspp2_1u:574_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:586: indriyāsvabhāvatayā [ŚsP_II-1_27] madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:587_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrendriyāsattāyām indriyaśūnyatāyām indriyaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:587_1: indriyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:587_2: na cānyā indriyāsattānyā indriyaśūnyatānyā indriyaviviktatānyā indriyāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:587_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:587_4: yā cendriyāsattā yā cendriyaśūnyatā yā cendriyaviviktatā yā cendriyāsvabhāvatā yaś
S06sspp2_1u:587_5: ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:599: balāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:600_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra balāsattāyāṃ balaśūnyatāyāṃ balaviviktatāyāṃ balāsvabhāvatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:600_1: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā balāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:600_3: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca balāsattā yā ca balaśūnyatā
S06sspp2_1u:600_4: yā ca balaviviktatā yā ca balāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto
S06sspp2_1u:600_5: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:613_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhyaṅgāsattāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaśūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:613_1: bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:613_2: na cānyā bodhyaṅgāsattānyā bodhyaṅgaśūnyatānyā bodhyaṅgaviviktatānyā bodhyaṅgāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:613_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra

S06sspp2_1u:613_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.

S06sspp2_1u:626_1: āryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam

S06sspp2_1u:626_4: iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgāsattā yā cāryaṣṭāṅgamārgaśūnyatā

S06sspp2_1u:639_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāryasatyāsattāyām āryasatyaśūnyatāyām āryasatyaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:639_1: āryasatyāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:639_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra

S06sspp2_1u:651: dhyānāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:652_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dhyānāsattāyāṃ dhyānaśūnyatāyāṃ dhyānaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:652_1: dhyānāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:652_2: na cānyā dhyānāsattānyā dhyānaśūnyatānyā dhyānaviviktatānyā dhyānāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:652_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca dhyānāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:652_4: yā ca dhyānaśūnyatā yā ca dhyānaviviktatā yā ca dhyānāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:652_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:664: apramāṇāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:665_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāpramāṇāsattāyām apramāṇaśūnyatāyām apramāṇaviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:665_1: apramāṇāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:665_3: 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā cāpramāṇāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:665_4: yā cāpramāṇaśūnyatā yā cāpramāṇaviviktatā yā cāpramāṇāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_1u:665_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:677: ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:678_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrārūpyasamāpattyasattāyām ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatāyām ārūpyasamāpatti
S06sspp2_1u:678_1: viviktatāyām ārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:678_2: na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā ārūpyasamāpattyasattānyā ārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatānyā

S06sspp2_1u:678_5: yā cārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatā yā cārūpyasamāpattiviviktatā [ŚsP_II-1_31] yā cārūpyasamāpattyasvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:678_6: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:680: vimokṣaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti. vimokṣaviviktatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:689: vimokṣāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:690_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vimokṣāsattāyāṃ vimokṣaśūnyatāyāṃ vimokṣaviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:690_1: vimokṣāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:690_2: na cānyā vimokṣāsattānyā vimokṣaśūnyatānyā vimokṣaviviktatānyā vimokṣāsvabhāvatānyo
S06sspp2_1u:690_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:690_4: yā ca vimokṣāsattā yā ca vimokṣaśūnyatā yā ca vimokṣaviviktatā yā ca vimokṣāsvabhāvatā
S06sspp2_1u:690_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:702: anupūrvavihārasamāpattyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:703_3: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:703_4: yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattyasattā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatā yā cānupūrvavihārasamāpattiviviktatā

S06sspp2_1u:703_6: yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:715: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:716_2: pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate. na cānyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattānyā
S06sspp2_1u:716_5: 'parānto 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāsattā
S06sspp2_1u:716_8: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:728: abhijñāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:729_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrābhijñāsattāyām abhijñāśūnyatāyām abhijñāviviktatāyām
S06sspp2_1u:729_1: abhijñāsvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.

S06sspp2_1u:729_5: yaś ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:741: samādhyasvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:742_0: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra samādhyasattāyāṃ samādhiśūnyatāyāṃ samādhiviviktatāyāṃ
S06sspp2_1u:742_1: samādhyasvabhāvatāyāṃ pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:742_2: na cānyā samādhyasattānyā samādhiśūnyatānyā samādhiviviktatānyā samādhyasvabhāvatānyo

S06sspp2_1u:925: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06sspp2_1u:929: kena kāraṇena rūpāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:930_0: tadyathāpi nāmāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:930_1: na madhyam upalabhyate. anantāparyantatayā ākāśam iti nāma vyavahriyate. evam evāyuṣmañ
S06sspp2_1u:930_2: chāradvatīputra na rūpasya pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam
S06sspp2_1u:930_3: upalabhyate rūpaśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ
S06sspp2_1u:932: kena kāraṇena vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyeti. vedanā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:933: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:935_0: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vedanāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate
S06sspp2_1u:935_1: na madhyam upalabhyate vedanāśūnyatām upādāya. na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:935_2: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:938: saṃjñā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:941: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃjñāyā na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃjñāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:942: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa [ŚsP_II-1_43] saṃjñāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:945: saṃskārā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:948: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra saṃskārāṇāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate saṃskāraśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:949: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:952: vijñānam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:955: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vijñānasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate vijñānaśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:956: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:959: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamam. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:1701: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pratisaṃvidāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate pratisaṃvidśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:1702: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa pratisaṃvidaparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1706: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1708: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra mahākaruṇānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate mahākaruṇāśūnyatām upādāya,
S06sspp2_1u:1709: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa [ŚsP_II-1_69] mahākaruṇāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1712: āveṇikabuddhadharmā āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākāśasamāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1713: tadyathāpi nāmākāśasya na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1715: evam evāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāveṇikabuddhadharmānāṃ na pūrvānta upalabhyate nāparānta upalabhyate na madhyam upalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1717: na ca śūnyatāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vopalabhyate. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇāveṇikabuddhadharmāparyantatayā bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā.
S06sspp2_1u:1718: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:1719: kena kāraṇena rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1720: kena kāraṇena vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1721: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1722: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti,
S06sspp2_1u:1723: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyata iti. rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1724: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1725: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. vedanā vedanayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1726: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1727: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. saṃjñā saṃjñayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1728: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃjñā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1729: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1730: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskārāḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1731: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate. vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1732: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1733: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:1735: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra dānapāramitā dānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1736: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śīlapāramitā śīlapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1737: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śīlapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. kṣāntipāramitā kṣāntipāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1738: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. vīryapāramitā vīryapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1739: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vīryapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1740: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānapāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1741: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1742: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrādhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1743: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1744: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1745: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1746: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1747: na hi śūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1748: śūnyatāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1749: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1750: mahāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1751: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahāśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1752: paramārthaśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1753: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ paramārthaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1754: saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃskṛtaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1755: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ saṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1757: na hi śūnyatāyām asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1759: na hi śūnyatāyām atyantaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1761: na hi śūnyatāyām anavarāgraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1763: na hi śūnyatāyām anavakāraśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1764: prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1765: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ prakṛtiśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1766: sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmaśūnyatayā [ŚsP_II-1_71] śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1767: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1768: svalakṣanaśūnyatā svalakṣanaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1769: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ svalakṣanaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1771: na hi śūnyatāyām anupalambhaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1773: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1774: bhāvaśūnyatā bhāvaśūnyatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1775: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:1777: na hi śūnyatāyām abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1778: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra smṛtyupasthānāni smṛtyupasthānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1779: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ smṛtyupasthānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samyakprahāṇāni samyakprahāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1780: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ṛddhipādā ṛddhipādaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1781: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samyakprahāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. indriyāṇīndriyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1782: na hi śūnyatāyām indriyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. balāni balaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1783: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ balāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. bodhyaṅgāni bodhyaṅgaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1784: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bodhyaṅgāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1785: na hi śūnyatāyām āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āryasatyāny āryasatyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1786: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ āryasatyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhyānāni dhyānaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1787: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhyānāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. apramāṇāny apramāṇaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1788: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ apramāṇāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. ārūpyasamāpattaya ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1789: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. aṣṭau vimokṣā vimokṣaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1790: na hi śūnyatāyām aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1791_0: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ saṃvidyante na [ŚsP_II-1_72] bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1791_1: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣa mukhaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1792: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. abhijñā abhijñābhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1793: na hi śūnyatāyām abhijñāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. samādhayaḥ samādhibhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1794: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ samādhayaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dhāraṇīmukhāni dhāraṇīmukhaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1795: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatabalāni tathāgatabalaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1796: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgatabalāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. vaiśāradyāni vaiśāradyaiḥ śūnyāni. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1797: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ vaiśāradyāni saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. pratisaṃvidaḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1798: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratisaṃvidaḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. mahākaruṇā mahākaruṇayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1799: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mahākaruṇā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. āveṇikabuddhadharmā āveṇikabuddhadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1800: na hi śūnyatāyām āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ saṃvidyante na bodhisattvaḥ. dharmadhātur dharmadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1801: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ dharmadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathatā tathatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1802: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1803: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ bhūtakoṭiḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. acintyadhātur acintyadhātunā śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1804: na hi śūnyatāyām acintyadhātuḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvajñatā sarvajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1805: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. mārgākārajñatā mārgākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1806: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mārgākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1807: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1808: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1809: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1810: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ buddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ. tat [ŚsP_II-1_73] kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1811: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhaḥ pratyekabuddhena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1812: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhaḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. tathāgatas tathāgatena śūnyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:1813: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ tathāgataḥ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:1814: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1815: vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1816: saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1817: saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1818: vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:1819: yad apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evam āha kena kāraṇena vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:1820: evam āha sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalambhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ vadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
S06sspp2_1u:1821: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1834: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1838: cakṣuḥ śrotraś ca ghrāṇe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1871: cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānañ ca ghrāṇavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1888: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1891: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1894: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1921: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuś ca tejodhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1923: tejodhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātāv abdhātau ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1924: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1927: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1930: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1938: avidyā saṃskārāś ca vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1940: vijñānam avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1973: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1976: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1979: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1983: dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1993: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1996: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:1999: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā mahāśūnyatā paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2042: smṛtyupasthānāni samyakprahāṇāny ṛddhipādeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2044: ṛddhipādāḥ smṛtyupasthāneṣu samyakprahāṇeṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2062: āryasatyāni dhyānāni cāpramāṇeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2064: apramāṇāny āryasatyeṣu dhyāneṣu ca na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2091: tathāgatabalāni vaiśāradyāni ca pratisaṃvitsu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2102: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāś ca srotaāpattidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2105: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭakadharmāḥ srotaāpattidharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2108: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhattvadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2111: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā anāgāmidharmā arhaddharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2114: gotrabhūdharmā aṣṭamakadharmāḥ srotaāpannadharmāḥ sakṛdāgāmidharmā arhaddharmāḥ pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
S06sspp2_1u:2122: pṛthagjanabhūmir gotrabhūmiś cāṣṭamakabhūmau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2150: sarvajñatā mārgākārajñatā ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2157: srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī cānāgāmini na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2159: anāgāmī srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmini ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2179: avavādānuśāsanī bodhisattvaprajñāpāramitayor na saṃvidyate nopa labhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:2180: evam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra sarvadharmeṣv asaṃvidyamāneṣv anupalabhamāneṣu bodhisattvo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_1u:2181: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivaṃ vadasi kena kāraṇena nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta punar bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2183: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2184: tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2185: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti vedaneti saṃjñeti saṃskārā iti vijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2186: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2187: yac ca nāmadheyamātrañ ca na tad rūpaṃ na sā vedanā na sā saṃjñā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2188: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2189: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣur iti śrotram iti ghrāṇam iti jihveti kāya iti mana iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2190: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2191: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣur na śrotraṃ na tad ghrāṇaṃ na sā jihvā na sa kāyo na tan manaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2192: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2193: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta rūpam iti śabda iti gandha iti rasa iti sparśa iti dharmā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2194: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2195: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tad rūpaṃ na sa śabdo na gandho na sa raso na sa sparśo na te dharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2196: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2197: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣurvijñām iti śrotravijñānam iti ghrāṇavijñānam iti jihvāvijñānam iti kāyavijñānam iti manovijñānam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2198: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2199: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ na tac chrotravijñānaṃ na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ na tat kāyavijñānaṃ na tan manovijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2200: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2201_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśa
S06sspp2_1u:2201_1: iti śrotrasaṃsparśa iti ghrāṇasaṃsparśa iti jihvāsaṃsparśa [ŚsP_II-1_92] iti kāyasaṃsparśa
S06sspp2_1u:2202: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2203: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśo na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2204: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2205_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneti
S06sspp2_1u:2206: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2207_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:2207_1: na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā
S06sspp2_1u:2207_2: na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2208: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāmaṃ tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2209: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad uta pṛthivīdhātur ity abdhātur iti tejodhātur iti vāyudhātur ity ākāśadhātur iti vijñānadhātur iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2210: tathā hi nāma na kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2211: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sa pṛthivīdhātur na so 'bdhātur na sa tejodhātur na sa vāyudhātur na sa ākāśadhātur na sa vijñānadhātuḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2212: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ nāma svabhāvena yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tena kāraṇenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2213_0: āgantukam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāvidyeti saṃskārā
S06sspp2_1u:2213_1: iti vijñānam iti nāmarūpam iti ṣaḍāyatanam iti sparśam iti vedaneti tṛṣṇety upādānam
S06sspp2_1u:2213_2: iti bhava iti jātir iti jarāmaraṇam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2214: tathā hi na nāma kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati na kvacit tiṣṭhati,
S06sspp2_1u:2215_0: yac ca nāmadheyamātraṃ na sāvidyā na te saṃskārā na tad vijñānaṃ na tan nāmarūpaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:2215_1: na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sa sparśo na sā vedanā na sā tṛṣṇā na tad upādānaṃ na sa bhavo
S06sspp2_1u:2215_2: na sā jātir na taj jarāmaraṇam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2216: tathā hi nāma śūnyaṃ na nāma svabhāvena [ŚsP_II-1_93] yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2217: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā na ca nāmni dānapāramitā na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2218: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2219: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2220: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śīlapāramitā na ca nāmni śīlapāramitā na ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2221: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śīlapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2222: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2223: nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta kṣāntipāramitā na ca nāmni kṣāntipāramitā na ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2224: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca kṣāntipāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2225: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2226: namadheyamātram etad yad uta vīryapāramitā na ca nāmni vīryapāramitā na ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2227: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca vīryapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2228: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2229: namadheyamātram etad yad uta dhyānapāramitā na ca nāmni dhyānapāramitā na ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2230: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dhyānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2231: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2232: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2233: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prajñāpāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2234: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
S06sspp2_1u:2235: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmaśūnyatā na cādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2236: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2237: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2238: namadheyamātram etad yad uta bahirdhāśūnyatā na ca bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_94] nāma na ca nāmni bahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2239: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2240: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2241: namadheyamātram etad yad utādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā na cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2242: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2243: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2244: namadheyamātram etad yad uta śūnyatāśūnyatā na ca śūnyatāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni śūnyatāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2245: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca śūnyatāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2246: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2247: namadheyamātram etad yad uta mahāśūnyatā na ca mahāśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni mahāśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2248: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca mahāśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2249: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2250: namadheyamātram etad yad uta paramārthaśūnyatā na ca paramārthaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni paramārthaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2251: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca paramārthaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2252: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2253: namadheyamātram etad yad uta saṃskṛtaśūnyatā na ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni saṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2254: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2255: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2256: namadheyamātram etad yad utāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā na cāsaṃskṛtasunyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2257: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cāsaṃskṛtaśunyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2258: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2259: namadheyamātram etad yad utātyantaśūnyatā na cātyantaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny atyantaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2260: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cātyantaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2261: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2262: nāmadheyamātram etad yad utānavarāgraśūnyatā na cānavarāgraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavarāgraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2263: tathā [ŚsP_II-1_95] hi yac ca nāma yā cānavarāgraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2264: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2265: namadheyamātram etad yad utānavakāraśūnyatā na cānavakāraśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anavakāraśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2266: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānavakāraśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2267: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2268: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prakṛtiśūnyatā na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni prakṛtiśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2269: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2270: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2271: namadheyamātram etad yad uta sarvadharmaśūnyatā na ca sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni sarvadharmaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2272: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2273: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2274: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā na ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2275: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2276: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2277: namadheyamātram etad yad utānupalambhaśūnyatā na cānupalambhaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny anupalambhaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2278: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cānupalambhaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2279: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2280: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvaśūnyatā na cābhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2281: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā cābhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2282: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2283: namadheyamātram etad yad uta svabhāvaśūnyatā na ca svabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmni svabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:2284: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca svabhāvaśūnyatā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06sspp2_1u:2285: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti,
S06sspp2_1u:2286: namadheyamātram etad yad utābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na cabhavasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nāma na ca nāmny abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:3930: adhyātmaśūnyatāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3948: smṛtyupasthānāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtāṇi na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3949: samyakprahāṇāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3951: indriyāṇy asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3952: balāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3954: āryāṣṭāṇgo mārgo 'saṃskṛto na ca kasyacid vigamena. āryasatyāny āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrāsaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3955: dhyānāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3956: apramāṇāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,

S06sspp2_1u:3960: śūnyatānimittāpranihitavimokṣamukhāny asaṃskṛtāni na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3961: abhijñā asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,

S06sspp2_1u:3966: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'saṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3967: mahāmaitry asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena,
S06sspp2_1u:3969: aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3970: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yad asaṃskṛtaṃ so 'bhāvaḥ kṣayaś ca. anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā asaṃskṛtā na ca kasyacid vigamena.
S06sspp2_1u:3971: punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭasthā avināśinaḥ sarvadharmāḥ.

S06sspp2_1u:3974: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputrākūṭastham avināśi. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:3980: saṃskārā akūṭasthā avināśinaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:4313: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4315: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. mahāmaitry anabhisaṃskṛtā,
S06sspp2_1u:4319: tathā hy abhisaṃskartā nāsti. aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4323: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa rūpam anabhinirvṛttaṃ vedanānabhinirvṛttā saṃjñānabhinirvṛttā saṃskārā anabhinirvṛttā vijñānam anabhinirvṛttam.
S06sspp2_1u:4325: kena kāraṇenāyuṣmañ subhūte yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4329: yad anabhinirvṛttaṃ na tad vijñānam iti vadasi?
S06sspp2_1u:4330: evam etad āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4331: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4332: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. vedanā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4333: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃjñā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4334_0: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. saṃskārāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā
S06sspp2_1u:4334_1: yā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ
S06sspp2_1u:4334_2: prajñāyate. vijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4335: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4336: cakṣuḥ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4337: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. śrotraṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4338: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. ghrāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4339: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. jihvā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:4342: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4343: rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ yac ca prakṛtiśūnyaṃ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
