S06sspp2_1u:4419: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ṛddhipādā prakṛtiśūnyā y ā ca prakṛtiśūnyās teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4420: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. indriyāṇi prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4421: yeṣāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_154] notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. balāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4422: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. bodhyaṅgāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4423: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ prakṛtiśūnyo yaś ca prakṛtiśūnyaḥ tasya notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4424: yasya notpādo na vyayo na tasya sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. āryasatyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4425: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhyānāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4426: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. apramāṇāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4427: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4428: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4429: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4430: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4431: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. abhijñā prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4432: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. samādhayaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4433: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. dhāraṇīmukhāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4434: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. daśatathāgatabalāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4435: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catvāri vaiśāradyāni prakṛtiśūnyāni yāni ca prakṛtiśūnyāni teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4436: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prakṛtiśūnyā yāś ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ tāsāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4437: yāsāṃ notpādo na vyayo na tāsāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajnāyate. mahāmaitrī prakṛtiśūnyā [ŚsP_II-1_155] yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4438: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. mahākaruṇā prakṛtiśūnyā yā ca prakṛtiśūnyā tasyā notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4439: yasyā notpādo na vyayo na tasyāḥ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate. āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā ye ca prakṛtiśūnyāḥ teṣāṃ notpādo na vyayaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4440: yeṣāṃ notpādo na vyayo na teṣāṃ sthityanyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06sspp2_1u:4441: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa yad anabhisaṃskṛtaṃ na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4521: ye 'nabhisaṃskṛtā na te ṛddhipādāḥ yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tānīndriyāṇi,
S06sspp2_1u:4536: yāny anabhisaṃskṛtāni na tāni catvāri [ŚsP_II-1_157] vaiśāradyāni,
S06sspp2_1u:4537: yā anabhisaṃskṛtā na tāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4546: tat kim anabhinirvṛttaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyām anuśāsiṣyāmīti?
S06sspp2_1u:4547_0: tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yānabhinirvṛttiḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_1u:4547_1: sānābhinirvṛttir iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cābhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4549: tat kim anabhinirvṛttiṃ prajñāpāramitāyām avavadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmi.
S06sspp2_1u:4551_0: kena kāraṇena nānyatrābhivṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya cared iti. tathā
S06sspp2_1u:4551_1: hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran nānyam
S06sspp2_1u:4551_2: anabhinirvṛttim anyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyati. iti hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhisattvaś
S06sspp2_1u:4553: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vedanā samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4554: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃjñāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4555: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃjñā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4556: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4557: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4559: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatranabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotraṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4560: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotraṃ [ŚsP_II-1_158] cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4561: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4562: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4563: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ manaḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4564: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4566: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śabdaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4567: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śabdaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā gandhaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4568: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca gandhaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā rasaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4569: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca rasaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4570: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā dharmān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4571: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4573: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotravijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4574: tathā hy anabhinivṛttiś ca śrotravṇñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4576: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāvijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4577: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāvijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyavyñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4578: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyavijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv o advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manovijñānaṃ samanunpaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4579: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manovijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4581: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam [ŚsP_II-1_159] advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4582: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4583: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4584: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4585: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4586: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4588: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4589: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4590: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4591: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyāḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4592: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4593: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4595: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca pṛthivīdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abdhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4596: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābdhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tejodhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4597: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tejodhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vāyudhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4598: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vāyudhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkārm. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ākāśadhātuṃ [ŚsP_II-1_160] samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4599: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ākāśadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānadhātuṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4600: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānadhātuś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4602: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāvidyā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskārān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4603: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskārāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4604: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vijñānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter nāmarūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4605: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca nāmarūpaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4606: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṣaḍāyatanaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sparśaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4607: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sparśaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vedanāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4608: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vedanā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ tṛṣṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4609: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca tṛṣṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter upādānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4610: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca upādānaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bhavaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4611: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bhavaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter jātiṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4612: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jātiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter jarāmaraṇaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4613: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca jarāmaraṇaṃ cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4615: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dānapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter śīlapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4616: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śīlapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter kṣāntipāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4617: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca kṣāntipāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter vīryapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4618: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca vīryapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. [ŚsP_II-1_161] nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhyānapāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4619: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhyānapāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4620: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prajñāpāramitā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4622: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cādhyātmaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4623: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bahirdhāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4624: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4625: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca śūnyatāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4626: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ paramārthaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4627: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca paramārthaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4628: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4629: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter atyantaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4630: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cātyantaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anavarāgraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4631: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānavarāgraśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anavakāraśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4632: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānavakāraśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4633: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca prakṛtiśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4634: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvadharmaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4635: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter anupalambhaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4636: [ŚsP_II-1_162] tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cānupalambhaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4637: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4638: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca svabhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4639: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4641: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca smṛtyupasthānāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samyakprahāṇāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4642: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samyakprahāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ṛddhipādān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4643: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca ṛddhipādāṃś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter indriyāṇi samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4644: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cendriyāṇi cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter balāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4645: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca balāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter bodhyaṅgāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4646: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca bodhyaṅgāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4647: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter āryasatyāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4648: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāryasatyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhyānāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4649: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhyānāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter apramāṇāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4650: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter ārūpyasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4651: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cārūpyasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭau vimokṣāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4652: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭau vimokṣāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4653_0: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam
S06sspp2_1u:4654: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāpramāṇāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter abhijñāḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4655: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cābhijñāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ samādhīn samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4656: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca samādhayaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter dhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4657: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca dhāraṇīmukhāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter daśatathāgatabalāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4658: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca daśatathāgatabalāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catvāri vaiśāradyāni samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4659: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4660: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahāmaitrīṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4661: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahāmaitrī cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mahākaruṇāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4662: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mahākaruṇā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4663: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4664: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtter mārgākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4665: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca mārgākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram. nānyatrānabhinirvṛtteḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4666: tathā hy anabhinirvṛttiś ca sarvākārajñatā cobhāv etau dharmāv advayam advaidhīkāram.
S06sspp2_1u:4667: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa nānyatrānabhinirvṛttyā bodhisattva upalabhyate yo bodhāya caret.
S06sspp2_1u:4668: yat punar āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputraivam āha kena kāraṇenaivaṃ vadasi,
S06sspp2_1u:4669_0: sacet bodhisatto mahāsattva evam uddiśyamānenotrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam
S06sspp2_1u:4669_1: āpadyate carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathā hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra
S06sspp2_1u:4669_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [ŚsP_II-1_164] nirīhakāt sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. svapnopamān
S06sspp2_1u:4669_3: sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. māyopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. mārīcyupamān
S06sspp2_1u:4669_4: sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratiśrutkopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. pratibhāsopamān
S06sspp2_1u:4669_5: sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati. nirmitopamān sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati.
S06sspp2_1u:4670: anenāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasyati saṃtrasati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06sspp2_1u:4672: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_1u:4673: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4674: tasmin samaye vedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4675: tasmin samaye saṃjñāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃjñeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4676: tasmin samaye saṃskārān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskārā ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4677: tasmin samaye vijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vijñānam etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4678: tasmin samaye cakṣur nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣur etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4679: tasmin samaye śrotraṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotram etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4680: tasmin samaye ghrāṇaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4681: tasmin samaye jihvāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihveyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4682: tasmin samaye kāyaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4683: tasmin samaye mano nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mana etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4684: tasmin samaye rūpaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati rūpam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4685: tasmin samaye śabdaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śabdo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4686: tasmin samaye gandhaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati gandho 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4687: tasmin samaye rasaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati [ŚsP_II-1_165] nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati raso 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4688: tasmin samaye sparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sparśao 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4689: tasmin samaye dharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dharmā ima iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4690: tasmin samaye cakṣurvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣurvijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4691: tasmin samaye śrotravijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotravijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4692: tasmin samaye ghrāṇavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajftāpayati ghrāṇavijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4693: tasmin samaye jihvāvijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāvijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4694: tasmin samaye kāyavijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyavijñānam etad iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4695: tasmin samaye manovijñānaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manovijñānam etad iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4696: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4697: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4698: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4699: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4700: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśo 'yam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4701: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśo 'yam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4702: tasmin samaye cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4703: tasmin samaye śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4704: tasmin samaye ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4705: tasmin samaye jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4706: tasmin samaye kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ [ŚsP_II-1_166] nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4707: tasmin samaye manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedaneyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4708: yasmin samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imān dharmān evam upaparīkṣate,
S06sspp2_1u:4709: tasmin samaye dānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dānapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4710: tasmin samaye śīlapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śīlapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4711: tasmin samaye kṣāntipāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati kṣāntipāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4712: tasmin samaye vīryapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati vīryapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4713: tasmin samaye dhyānapāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati dhyānapāramiteyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4714: tasmin samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prajñāpāramiteyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4715: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4716: tasmin samaye bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati bahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4717: tasmin samaye 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4718: tasmin samaye śūnyatāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati śūnyatāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4719: tasmin samaye mahāśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati mahāśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4720: tasmin samaye paramārthaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati paramārthaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4721: tasmin samaye saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati saṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4722: tasmin samaye 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty asaṃskṛtaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4723: tasmin samaye 'tyantaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty atyantaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4724: tasmin samaye 'navarāgraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavarāgraśūnyateyam [ŚsP_II-1_167] iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4725: tasmin samaye 'navakāraśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anavakāraśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4726: tasmin samaye prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati prakṛtiśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4727: tasmin samaye sarvadharmaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati sarvadharmaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4728: tasmin samaye svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svalakṣaṇaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4729: tasmin samaye 'nupalambhaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty anupalambhaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4730: tasmin samaye 'bhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4731: tasmin samaye svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayati svabhāvaśūnyateyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4732: tasmin samaye 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñāpayaty abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyateyam iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4733: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtyupasthānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati smṛtyupasthānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4734: tasmin samaye samyakprahāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samyakprahāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4735: tasmin samaye ṛddhipādān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati ṛddhipādā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4736: tasmin samaye indriyāṇi nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayatīndriyāṇy etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4737: tasmin samaye balāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati balānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4738: tasmin samaye bodhyaṅgāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati bodhyaṅgānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4739: tasmin samaye āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryāṣṭaṅgo mārga iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4740: tasmin samaye āryasatyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āryasatyāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4741: tasmin samaye dhyānāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhyānāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4742: tasmin samaye 'pramāṇāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty apramāṇāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4743: tasmin samaye ārūpyasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty ārūpyasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4744: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭau vimokṣān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty aṣṭau vimokṣā [ŚsP_II-1_168] ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4745: tasmin samaye navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati navānupūrvavihārasamāpattaya imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4746: tasmin samaye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4747: tasmin samaye 'bhijñā nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty abhijñā imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4748: tasmin samaye samādhīn nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati samādhaya ima iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4749: tasmin samaye dhāraṇīmukhāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati dhāraṇīmukhāny etānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4750: tasmin samaye daśatathāgatabalāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati daśatathāgatabalānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4751: tasmin samaye catvāri vaiśāradyāni nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catvāri vaiśāradyānīmānīti,
S06sspp2_1u:4752: tasmin samaye catasraḥ pratisaṃvido nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati catasraḥ pratisaṃvida imā iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4753: tasmin samaye mahāmaitrīṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahāmaitrīyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4754: tasmin samaye mahākaruṇāṃ nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati mahākaruṇeyam iti,
S06sspp2_1u:4755: tasmin samaye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayaty āveṇikā buddhadharmā eta iti.
S06sspp2_1u:4756_0: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni
S06sspp2_1u:4756_1: nopaiti nopādatte nādhitiṣṭhati nābhiniviśate na prajñapayati sarvasamadhidhāraṇīmukhāṇy etānīti.
S06sspp2_1u:4758: tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06sspp2_1u:4862: tathā hi bhagavan yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:4864: cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4865: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4866: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4867: tathā hi bhagavan yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4868: iti hi vedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4869: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4870: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4871: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:4872: iti hi saṃjñā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4873: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4874: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā anutpādo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:4875: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārā,
S06sspp2_1u:4876: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4877: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4878: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4879: tathā hi bhagavan yo vijñānasyānutpādo na te vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4880: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4881: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4882: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ.
S06sspp2_1u:4883: tathā hi yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4884: iti hi cakṣuś [ŚsP_II-1_171] cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4885: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4886: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo 'nutpādo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4887: tathā hi bhagavan yaḥ śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:4888: iti hi śrotraṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4889: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4890: tasmād yah śrotrasyānutpādo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4891: tathā hi bhagavan ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:4892: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4893: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4894: tasmād yo ghrāṇasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4895: tathā hi bhagavan jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:4896: iti hi jihvā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4897: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4898: tasmād yo jihvāyā anutpādo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:4899: tathā hi yo bhagavan kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4900: iti hi kāyaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4901: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4902: tasmād yaḥ kāyasyānutpādo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4903: tathā hi yo bhagavan manaso 'nutpādo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4904: iti hi manaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4905: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4906: tasmād yo manaso nutpādo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:4907: yo bhagavan rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:4908: iti hi rūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4909: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4910: tasmād yo rūpasyānutpādo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4911: yo bhagavan śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4912: iti hi śabdaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4913: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4914: tasmād yaḥ śabdasyānutpādo na sa śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4915: yo bhagavan gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4916: iti hi gandhaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4917: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4918: tasmād yo gandhasyānutpādo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4920: yo bhagavan rasasyānutpādo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4921: iti hi rasaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4922: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4923: tasmād yo rasasyānutpādo na so rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4924: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśa,
S06sspp2_1u:4925: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4926: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4927: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4928: yo bhagavan dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4929: iti hi dharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4930: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4931: tasmād yo dharmāṇām anutpādo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4932: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4933: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4934: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4935: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasyānutpādo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4936: yo bhagavan śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4937: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4938: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4939: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasyānutpādo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4940: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4941: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4942: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4943: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasyānutpādo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4944: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4945: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4946: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4947: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasyānutpādo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4948: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4949: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4950: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4951: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasyānutpādo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4952: yo bhagavan manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:4953: iti hi manovijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4954: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4955: tasmād [ŚsP_II-1_173] yo manovijñānasyānutpādo na tan manovijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:4956: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4957: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4958: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4959: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4960: yo bhagavan śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4961: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4962: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4963: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4964: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4965: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4966: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4967: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4968: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na tan jihvāsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4969: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4970: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4971: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4972: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4973: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4974: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4975: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4976: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4977: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4978: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4979: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:4980: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4981: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4982: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4983: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4984: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4985: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4986: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda [ŚsP_II-1_174] eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4987: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4988: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4989: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4990: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4991: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4992: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4993: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4994: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4995: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4996: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:4997: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:4998: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:4999: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5000: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5001: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5002: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5003: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā anutpādo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5004: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5005: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5006: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5007: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor anutpādo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5008: yo bhagavan abdhātor anutpādo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5009: iti hy abdhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5010: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5012: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5013: iti hi tejodhātuś [ŚsP_II-1_175] cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5015: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5016: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor anutpādo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5017: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor anutpādo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5018: iti hi vāyudhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5019: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5020: tasmād yo vāyudhātor anutpādo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5021: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5022: iti hy ākāśadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5023: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5024: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor anutpādo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5025: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor anutpādo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5026: iti hi vijñānadhātuś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5027: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5028: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor anutpādo na so vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5029: yo bhagavann avidyāyā anutpādo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_1u:5030: iti hy avidyā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5031: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5033: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5034: iti hi saṃskārāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5036: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5037: tasmād yo saṃskārāṇām anutpādo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5038: yo bhagavan vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5039: iti hi vijñānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5040: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5041: tasmād yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5042: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5043: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5044: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5045: tasmād yo nāmarūpasyānutpādo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5046: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
S06sspp2_1u:5047: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5048: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5049: tasmād [ŚsP_II-1_176] yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasyānutpādo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5050: yo bhagavan sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5051: iti hi sparśaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5052: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5053: tasmād yaḥ sparśasyānutpādo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5054: yo bhagavan vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5055: iti hi vedanāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5056: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5057: tasmād yo vedanāyā anutpādo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5058: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5059: iti hi tṛṣṇāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5060: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5061: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā anutpādo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5062: yo bhagavan upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5063: iti hy upādānaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5064: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5065: tasmād ya upādānasyānutpādo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5066: yo bhagavan bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5067: iti hi bhavaś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5068: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5069: tasmād yo bhavasyānutpādo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5070: yo bhagavan jāter anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5071: iti hi jātiś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5072: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5073: tasmād yo jātier anutpādo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5074: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:5075: iti hi jarāmaraṇaṃ cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5076: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5077: tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasyānutpādo na taj jarāmaraṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5078: yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5079: iti hi dānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5080: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5081: tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5082: yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5083: iti hi śīlapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5084: [ŚsP_II-1_177] tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5085: tasmād yaḥ śīlapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā śīlapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5086: yo bhagavan kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5087: iti hi kṣāntipāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5088: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5089: tasmād yaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā anutpādo na sā kṣāntipāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5090: yo bhagavan vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5091: iti hi vīryapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5092: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5093: tasmād yo vīryapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā vīryapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5094: yo bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5095: iti hi dhyānapāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5096: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5097: tasmād yo dhyānapāramitāyā anutpādo na sā dhyānapāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5098: yo bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5099: iti hi prajñāpāramitā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5100: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5101: tasmād yo prajñāpāramitāyā anutpādo na sā prajnāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_1u:5102: yo bhagavann adhyātmaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5103: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5104: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5106: yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5107: iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5108: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5109: tasmād yo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5110: yo bhagavann adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5111: iti hy adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5112: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5114: yo bhagavan śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5115: iti hi śūnyatāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5116: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5117: tasmād [ŚsP_II-1_178] yaḥ śūnyatāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā śūnyatāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5118: yo bhagavan mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5119: iti hi mahāśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5120: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5121: tasmād yo mahāśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā mahāśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5122: yo bhagavan paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5123: iti hi paramārthaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5124: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5125: tasmād yaḥ paramārthaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā paramārthaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5126: yo bhagavan saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5127: iti hi saṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5128: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5129: tasmād yaḥ saṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5130: yo bhagavan asaṃskṛtaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5131: iti hy asaṃskṛtaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5132: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5134: yo bhagavan atyantaśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sātyantaśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5135: iti hy atyantaśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5136: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5138: yo bhagavan anavarāgraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavarāgraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5139: iti hy anavarāgraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5140: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5142: yo bhagavan anavakāraśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sānavakāraśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5143: iti hy anavakāraśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5144: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5146: yo bhagavan prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5147: iti hi prakṛtiśūnyatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5148: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5149: tasmād yaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā anutpādo na sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,

S06sspp2_1u:5277: tasmād yo mārgākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5278: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5279: iti hi sarvākārajñatā cānutpādaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5280: tathā hi bhagavan nānutpāda eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5281: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
S06sspp2_1u:5282: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5283: iti hi rūpañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5284: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5285: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5286: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5287: iti hi vedanā ca vyayas cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5288: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5289: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5290: yo bhagavan saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:5291: iti hi saṃjñā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5292: tathā hi bhagavan na [ŚsP_II-1_184] vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5293: tasmād yaḥ saṃjñāyā vyayo na sā saṃjñā,
S06sspp2_1u:5294: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5295: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5296: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5297: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārānāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5298: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5299: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5300: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5301: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:5302: yo bhagavan cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5303: iti hi cakṣuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5304: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5305: tasmād yaś cakṣuṣo vyayo na tac cakṣuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5306: yo bhagavan chrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotram,
S06sspp2_1u:5307: iti hi śrotraṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5308: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5309: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasya vyayo na tac chrotraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5310: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇam,
S06sspp2_1u:5311: iti hi ghrāṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5312: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5313: tasmād yo ghrāṇasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5314: yo bhagavan jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5315: iti hi jihvā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5316: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5317: tasmād yo jihvāyā vyayo na sā jihvā,
S06sspp2_1u:5318: yo bhagavan kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5319: iti hi kāyaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5320: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5321: tasmād yaḥ kāyasya vyayo na sa kāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5322: yo bhagavan manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5323: iti hi manaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5324: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5325: tasmād yo manaso vyayo na tan manaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5327: yo bhagavan rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpam iti hi rūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5328: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5329: tasmād yo rūpasya vyayo na tad rūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5330: yo bhagavan śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5331: iti hi śabdaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5332: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5333: tasmād yaḥ śabdasya vyayo na saḥ śabdaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5334: yo bhagavan gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5335: iti hi gandhaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5336: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5337: tasmād yo gandhasya vyayo na sa gandhaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5338: yo bhagavan rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5339: iti hi rasaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5340: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5341: tasmād yo rasasya vyayo na sa rasaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5342: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5343: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5344: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5345: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5346: yo bhagavan dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5347: iti hi dharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5349: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5350: tasmād yo dharmāṇāṃ vyayo na te dharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5351: yo bhagavan cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5352: iti hi cakṣurvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5353: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5354: tasmād yaś cakṣurvijñānasya vyayo na tac cakṣurvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5355: yo bhagavan chrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5356: iti hi śrotravijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5357: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5358: tasmād yaḥ śrotravijñānasya vyayo na tac chrotravijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5359: yo bhagavan ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5360: iti hi ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5361: [ŚsP_II-1_186] tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5362: tasmād yo ghrāṇavijñānasya vyayo na tad ghrāṇavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5363: yo bhagavan jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5364: iti hi jihvāvijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5365: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5366: tasmād yo jihvāvijñānasya vyayo na taj jihvāvijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5367: yo bhagavan kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5368: iti hi kāyavijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5369: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5370: tasmād yaḥ kāyavijñānasya vyayo na tat kāyavijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5371: yo bhagavan manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5372: iti hi manovijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5373: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5374: tasmād yo manovijñānasya vyayo na tan manovijñānam.
S06sspp2_1u:5375: yo bhagavan cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5376: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5377: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5378: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5379: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5380: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5381: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5382: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśassya vyayo na sa śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5383: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5384: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5385: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5386: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5387: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5388: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5389: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5390: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5391: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5392: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5393: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5394: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5396: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5397: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5398: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5399: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśasya vyayo na sa manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5400: yo bhagavaṃś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5401: iti hi cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5402: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5403: tasmād yaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5404: yo bhagavañ chrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5405: iti hi śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5406: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5407: tasmād yaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā śrotrasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5408: yo bhagavan ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5409: iti hi ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5410: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5411: tasmād yo ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā ghrāṇasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5412: yo bhagavan jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5413: iti hi jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5414: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5415: tasmād yo jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā jihvāsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5416: yo bhagavan kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5417: iti hi kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5418: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5419: tasmād yaḥ kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā kāyasaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5420: yo bhagavan manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5421: iti hi manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5422: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5423: tasmād yo manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāyā vyayo na sā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā.
S06sspp2_1u:5425: yo bhagavan pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5426: iti hi pṛthivīdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5427: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5428: tasmād yaḥ pṛthivīdhātor vyayo na sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5429: yo bhagavann abdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5430: iti hy abdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5431: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5433: yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5434: iti hi tejodhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5436: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5437: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5438: yo bhagavan vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5439: iti hi vāyudhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5440: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5441: tasmād yo vāyudhātor vyayo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5442: yo bhagavann ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa akāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5443: iti hy ākāśadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5444: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5445: tasmād ya ākāśadhātor vyayo na sa ākāśadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5446: yo bhagavan vijñānadhātor vyayo na sa vijñānadhātuḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5447: iti hi vijñānadhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5448: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5449: tasmād yo vijñānadhātor vyayo na so vijñānadhātuḥ.
S06sspp2_1u:5450: yo bhagavann avidyāyā vyayo na sāvidyā,
S06sspp2_1u:5451: iti hy avidyā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5452: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5454: yo bhagavan saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5455: iti hi saṃskārāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5456: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5457: tasmād yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vyayo na te saṃskārāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5458: yo bhagavan vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5459: iti hi vijñānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5460: tathā hi bhagavan [ŚsP_II-1_189] na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5461: tasmād yo vijñānasya vyayo na tad vijñānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5462: yo bhagavan nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpam,
S06sspp2_1u:5463: iti hi nāmarūpaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5464: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5465: tasmād yo nāmarūpasya vyayo na tan nāmarūpaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5466: yo bhagavan ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanam,
S06sspp2_1u:5467: iti hi ṣaḍāyatanañ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5468: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5469: tasmād yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5470: yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5471: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5472: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5473: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5474: yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5475: iti hi vedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5476: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5477: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
S06sspp2_1u:5478: yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5479: iti hi tṛṣṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5480: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5481: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5482: yo bhagavan upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānam,
S06sspp2_1u:5483: iti hy upādānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5484: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5485: tasmād ya upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānaṃ,
S06sspp2_1u:5486: yo bhagavan bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,

S06sspp2_1u:5488: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5489: tasmād yo bhavasya vyayo na sa bhavaḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5490: yo bhagavan jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5491: iti hi jātiś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5492: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5493: tasmād yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5494: yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam,

S06sspp2_1u:5665: iti hi mahāmaitrī ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:5667: tasmād yo mahāmaitryā vyayo na sā mahāmaitrī,
S06sspp2_1u:5668: yo bhagavan mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5669: iti hi mahākaruṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5670: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5671: tasmād yo mahākaruṇāyā vyayo na sā mahākaruṇā,
S06sspp2_1u:5672: yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5673: iti hy āveṇikabuddhadharmāś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5674: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5675: tasmād ya āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ vyayo na ta āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
S06sspp2_1u:5676: yo bhagavan sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5677: iti hi sarvajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_1u:5678: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
S06sspp2_1u:5679: tasmād yaḥ sarvajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5680: yo bhagavan mārgākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā mārgākārajñatā,
S06sspp2_1u:5681: iti hi mārgākārajñatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_1u:5684: yo bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā,

S06sspp2_1u:5687: tasmād yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vyayo na sā sarvākārajñatā.
